attributes.action: Change the Law on which animals need to be reported in a road accident
attributes.additional_details: All Animals deserve respect and help the same as Humans do. They are helpless and voiceless. I am Their Voice
attributes.background:
It is a legal requirement to stop and report the accident to Police Scotland when you hit a dog, goat, horse, cattle, donkey, mule, sheep or pig with your car.

This should be changed. Any Animal that has been hit by a car especially pet Cats...should be reported to Police Scotland.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  

Drivers who hit cats in their car should stop and take the cat to a vet
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700808
